questions.title: 我永远都不会忘记你对我的承诺。
questions.answer: I'll never forget your promise to me.

questions.title: 我永远不会忘记走进校园的那一天。
questions.answer: I'll never forget the day I walked into the campus.

questions.title: 我们不会忘记在困难时你对我们的帮助。
questions.answer: We will never forget your help when we are in trouble.

questions.title: 我永远不会忘记黎明之后山里美丽的风景。
questions.answer: I'll never forget the beautiful scenery of the mountains after dawn.

questions.title: 这次的事情太惊险了，我一辈子都不可能忘记。
questions.answer: The matter is too dangerous, I'll never forget it.

title: ——我永远忘不了她迷人的微笑。
——我也是！

answer.en: I'll never forget her charming smile.

title: ——《泰坦尼克号》真的是太精彩了，我永远都不会忘记。
——下次再来看。

answer.en: The Titanic is so wonderful and I'll never forget.

title: ——你这段时间对我的好我永远不会忘记。
——没有关系！

answer.en: I'll never forget your kindness to me these days.
